Hello, I'm Sophia!

I am pursuing my M.Sci. in Software Engineering at Stevens Institute of Technology. I graduated with my B.E. Software Engineering and a minor in Information Systems in May 2024. I have interest in web and app development, as well as data analytics. My favorite project has been Software Development Research Assistant. I am looking for full-time opportunities in any field!

Projects

Decision Interconnection Analyzer

Front-End Development OpenAI API Python

I can't say too much on this one due to an NDA. But as a small snippit, I contributed to the development of a Python-based tool designed to enhance decision-making processes by implementing a prompt generation mechanism and addressing integration challenges with OpenAI's capabilities. By integrating GPT-4, I advanced the tool's functionality to include text extraction from PDFs and the generation of key points and prompts. Additionally, I created a React site featuring a wheel graphic and a MongoDB backend to support the tool's operations.

SmartSecure

Java App Developemnt UI/UX Design

Check it out here! I led the development of the software component for the SmartSecure project, a door lock system utilizing NFC technology for user authentication. Designed and implemented an Android companion app with Java, Android navigation components, and UI elements to enhance user interaction. Created intuitive features including a navigation drawer with toggle functionality, dynamic lock status display, and Google Firebase-based user authentication.

Situation-Aware Framework for Energy Saving in Unattended Activities of Daily Living in Smart Home Environments

Web Developemnt PHP, MySQL App Developemt

I led data collection and analysis on over 400 minutes of audio data using Excel to support the creation of an IoT model for automating smart devices to detect user movement. I developed several Android Studio apps with features like geofencing, light sensing, and location tracking, focusing on user-friendly interfaces. Additionally, I designed and built a website from scratch using HTML, CSS, and PHP for the research organization, incorporating an admin dashboard to streamline data entry into a SQL database, enabling live updates to the site. My work contributed to the publication you can read here!
